positions.comment: In Whitby Harbour.  The twins are with us.
We Are still in Whitby.  Hope to leave the week of Sep 25 for the Erie Canal
Arrived Oswego Sep 27.  Good Crossing. Sunny and warm 70+
Anchored in Kingston up a little creek.  The leaves are beautiful.
Still in Kingston.  Had over 8 " of rain.  Our anchor is holding well.
Motored to Beacon.  Wind, Rain, Cold . Low 50's.
Anchored at Crouton Point. Rain Finally stopped. Sun is to shine today.
Arrived New York City in Sunshine !!! Will stay here a week.
